about_the_game:
Craft your own adventure with Wood Guy, a charming 2D platformer with combat set in a stunning handcrafted 3D world. Master physics, solve intricate challenges, and customize your wooden puppet. Play solo, team up with friends, or clash in chaotic Versus mode!

Master the Art of Physics

Defy gravity, embrace momentum, and craft your strategy!

Swing across gaps, defy gravity, and solve intricate puzzles using momentum and clever thinking. Over 300 handcrafted levels challenge you to harness physics as your greatest tool, creating a thrilling and creative gameplay experience.

Team Up for Adventure

Join forces with friends or double the chaos in co-op!

Share the fun with a friend in local co-op! Solve puzzles, take down towering bosses, and explore stunning levels together. Combining your skills and strategies makes every challenge more rewarding and every victory sweeter.

Battle Your Friends in Versus Mode

Fight your way through physics-based chaos!

Test your skills in local Versus mode! Up to 4 players can clash in chaotic, physics-driven arenas. Push, pull, and outwit your friends in fast-paced matches where quick thinking and strategy reign supreme.

Create Your Perfect Puppet

Build, customize, and showcase your unique style!

Build the ultimate wooden adventurer! Unlock and equip dozens of unique parts and upgrades to personalize your character. Each choice adds style and functionality, making your puppet truly one of a kind.

Explore a World of Wonder

Dive into vibrant, handcrafted environments!

Explore a whimsical world filled with creativity and secrets. Travel through lush forests, intricate workshops, and more across 300+ levels. Uncover treasures, solve puzzles, and unlock hidden paths in a universe designed for discovery.

Take on Epic Challenges

Face tricky puzzles, powerful bosses, and daring quests!

Face puzzles, traps, and bosses that test your reflexes, strategy, and creativity. Whether solving tricky platforming sections or battling colossal foes, every challenge pushes you to become the ultimate wooden warrior.

Key Features

  • Physics-Based Gameplay: Use gravity, momentum, and ingenuity to conquer levels.

  • Solo and Co-op Modes: Play solo or with a friend in local co-op to solve puzzles and defeat bosses.

  • Competitive Versus Mode: Face off in chaotic physics battles for up to 4 players.

  • Extensive Customization: Unlock and equip parts to create your perfect wooden puppet.

  • Handcrafted Worlds: Discover over 300 levels filled with puzzles, secrets, and treasures.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Outsmart and defeat challenging enemies in creative showdowns.”

About the Developer

YSO Corp is a French indie game studio, crafting unforgettable experiences for players around the globe. Since 2018, we’ve brought over 180 titles to life and reached 1 billion downloads. Now, we’re channeling that expertise into PC and console games like Wood Guy, blending creativity, innovation, and passion into every project.

highlighted.name: The beginning of a great collection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.0
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Wood Guy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
